faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: MagicTime is an innovative crypto project where time becomes a digital asset. Each MAGT token is a “piece of time” you can own, trade and use in the ecosystem.
faq.q2: Which currency do I pay with?
faq.a2: Native TON. Connect via TonConnect in your wallet.
faq.a3: After the presale ends, the Claim button will appear. You can withdraw all purchased tokens to your TON address.
faq.a4: The invitee buys MAGT with your link ?ref=YOUR_ADDRESS. After a successful purchase, 5% is credited to your address in MAGT.
faq.q5: How does the price change during the presale?
faq.a5: The presale goes in rounds. Each next round has a higher price per token.
faq.a6: Yes, a minimum may be set to reduce network costs and prevent spam.
faq.a8: You pay the TON network fee for the transaction.
faq.q9: Is it safe? What are the risks?
faq.a9: Crypto investments are risky. Don’t invest more than you can afford to lose.
